title: Life Among the Drop-Dead Gorgeous - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Debts   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Revenge   R*pe   Showbiz   Wealthy Characters
author: Inky Kirin   Mo Qi Lin   墨麒麟
description:
Lin Mutian was an earnest “uncle” whose career fell to the bottom from its peak, turning him from a popular star into an ordinary man who was past his prime, had his contract terminated, and facing a bleak future. Should he start all over again? Or should he join the nanny industry?

How was he going to pay off his huge debts?!

The existence of an “uncle” always brings out that of a handsome young man. Would the life of an “uncle” be turned upside down when a handsome young man had his eyes on him and pestered him all day?

According to those handsome young men, if someone had to deal with the tough stuff, let “uncle” do it!>
